name: Robotic Grid-based Breakout
description:
Robotic Grid-based Breakout - puzzle game, where you need to escape rooms opening doors and activating pressure plates.

Controls:

Space - switch between Red and Blue doors

W,A,S,D - movement

R - restart level

Tip of the day:

Pay attention to the effects of the pressure plates! (Some of them have side effects)

Source:

The game's source code is available here: https://github.com/xill47/rgb-doors

Made by:

Programming, a level: @xill47
Sprites, sound, most levels: @NedoKontent
